channel.title: Got the client , got the server
channel.description: hello, i want to ask , if i got the client , so how to i put the server and client together , like i just send example my friend the whole thing , that he could log in too , hope someone understand what im asking

item.title: Got the client , got the server
item.dc:creator: @Rastafarai Rastafarai
item.description:
@Rastafarai wrote:

i need to put new ip to files as like scape.no-ip.info or like an real IP ?

Read full topic
item.source: Got the client , got the server

item.title: Got the client , got the server
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

A server is what the clients connect to – the server owner is the only one that needs both.

Your friend only needs the client, which connects to the server which is running on your computer.

Google ‘server’ and ‘client’. Learn something.

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:373844”]You change the IP of the current IP in the client files. You must remember to change the IP with the No-Ip that has been set. Then upload the client in a .rar format to like… Uppit, MegaUpload etc.

You must leave the server online for someone to login.[/quote]I highly doubt this guy cares about a client-specific server.

Small servers like that are annoying anyways.

Read full topic
item.source: Got the client , got the server

item.title: Got the client , got the server
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You change the IP of the current IP in the client files. You must remember to change the IP with the No-Ip that has been set. Then upload the client in a .rar format to like… Uppit, MegaUpload etc.

You must leave the server online for someone to login.

Read full topic
